creator: youmediahpl
title: Stop Motion Animation
materials_required: iPods (or other camera - digital is easiest!)
description: This project guides users through the process of creating a stop motion animation film, from writing the story to editing and sharing the final product. Stop motion animation is a filmmaking technique that involves reproducing images sequentially to create the illusion of movement.
steps: Write your story, keeping it concise as each second of film requires many shots.
Set up the camera on a tripod, pointed at the scene. Use a mobile app, create a new project, and adjust settings like frame rate and overlays. Keep the camera still to avoid unwanted movement.
Move the subjects a tiny bit between each image, maintaining patience for a smooth animation.
Incorporate transformations or special effects, such as making objects disappear or change shape using creative animation techniques.
Edit the final video, removing unwanted shots, adding titles, music, or sound effects and export before finally sharing with friends.
